title: French Open: Bopanna-Middelkoop upset Olympic champions Mektic-Pavic to enter quarterfinals
content:
Rohan Bopanna and Matwe Middelkoop defeated second seeds and Olympic gold medallists Nikola Mektic and Mate Pavic 6-7(5) 7-6(3) 7-6(10) in two hours and 32 minutes in the menâ€™s doubles third round to advance to the French Open quarterfinals.The Indo-Dutch 16th seeds beat the Croatian pair in an absolute thriller after being down in the first set and saving five match points.#RolandGarros WHAT.
